## ISentJoinRequest interface

A request by the acting user to become a member of a conversation. The existance of an instance implies that the request is still pending.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ISentJoinRequest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [conversationId](./core-conversations.isentjoinrequest.conversationid.md) | <code>ConversationId</code> | The ID of the conversation the acting user requests to join. |
|  [id](./core-conversations.isentjoinrequest.id.md) | <code>JoinRequestId</code> | Uniquely identifies a conversation join request. |
|  [requestedAt](./core-conversations.isentjoinrequest.requestedat.md) | <code>Timestamp</code> | The point in time the request to join the conversation was made. |
